name: Philip J. Hatcher
content: Phil Hatcher's Home Page Philip J. Hatcher, Professor Emeritus Department of Computer Science University of New Hampshire, Durham, NH 03824, USA Phil Hatcher retired at the end of the Spring 2019 semester, after 33 years at the University of New Hampshire. His course websites, including links to video lectures, are archived here. His curriculum vitae is available here. In retirement he is looking forward to spending more time as an active grandparent, and he plans to return to his unfinished novel about Lincoln's doctor's cats.
